mapper.select: select BOOKTITLE, BOOKWRITER, BOOKPUB, COUNT(BOOKSEQ) as BOOKCOUNT, (select COUNT(case when BOOKSTATUS!=1 then BOOKSEQ end) from BOOK b2 where b2.BOOKTITLE=b1.BOOKTITLE and b2.BOOKWRITER=b1.BOOKWRITER and b1.BOOKPUB=b2.BOOKPUB group by b2.BOOKTITLE) as RENTCOUNT from BOOK b1 group by BOOKTITLE, BOOKWRITER, BOOKPUB order by BOOKTITLE

select BOOKTITLE, BOOKWRITER, BOOKPUB, COUNT(BOOKSEQ) as BOOKCOUNT, (select COUNT(case when BOOKSTATUS!=1 then BOOKSEQ end) from BOOK b2 where b2.BOOKTITLE=b1.BOOKTITLE and b2.BOOKWRITER=b1.BOOKWRITER and b1.BOOKPUB=b2.BOOKPUB group by b2.BOOKTITLE) as RENTCOUNT from BOOK b1 where ${option} like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') group by BOOKTITLE, BOOKWRITER, BOOKPUB order by BOOKTITLE

select BOOKTITLE, BOOKWRITER, BOOKPUB, COUNT(BOOKSEQ) as BOOKCOUNT, (select COUNT(case when BOOKSTATUS!=1 then BOOKSEQ end) from BOOK b2 where b2.BOOKTITLE=b1.BOOKTITLE and b2.BOOKWRITER=b1.BOOKWRITER and b1.BOOKPUB=b2.BOOKPUB group by b2.BOOKTITLE) as RENTCOUNT from BOOK b1 where BOOKTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR BOOKWRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR BOOKPUB LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') group by BOOKTITLE, BOOKWRITER, BOOKPUB order by BOOKTITLE

BOOKTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') and BOOKWRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{writer}, '%') and BOOKPUB LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pub}, '%')
BOOKWRITER like CONCAT('%', #{writer}, '%') and BOOKPUB like CONCAT('%', #{pub}, '%')
BOOKTITLE like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') and BOOKPUB like CONCAT('%', #{pub}, '%')
BOOKTITLE like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') and BOOKWRITER like CONCAT('%', #{writer}, '%')
group by BOOKTITLE, BOOKWRITER, BOOKPUB order by BOOKTITLE
select * from BOOK where BOOKTITLE=#{title} and BOOKWRITER=#{writer} and BOOKPUB=#{pub}
